pullRequest.body:
This adds all the remaining material necessary for `ContinuousMapZero` to get the instances of the non-unital continuous functional calculus.

Co-authored-by: @adedecker

---

source.title: [Merged by Bors] - feat: the non-unital star subalgebra generated by `id` is dense in `C(s, 𝕜)₀`
[Merged by Bors] - feat: restriction of the non-unital continuous functional calculus to a scalar subring
